programme.title: It's Showtime

programme.title: Eseng Ng Tondo
programme.desc: FPJ played Eseng 45, a Manila policeman known for his proficiency with the 45 caliber gun. He was also known to be an honest and dedicated cop, the nemesis of evil in the crime-ridden area of Tondo.

programme.title: Bondying (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Jimmy Santos took on the role of one of the country's most beloved komik characters. Bondying, whose name has come to mean somebody immature or who never grew passed childhood.

programme.title: Eagle Squad (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eight young men of different convictions, lifestyles and outlook in life banded together to become the Eagle Squad, an elite group of secret marshalls formed to counteract criminal elements in the city.

programme.title: Pintsik Haik
programme.desc: As a head of a small time general services, business and some illegal activity, Mando is satisfied enough on what they earned and share some blessings to the charity. But one day he was hired to rescue the father of May-leng.

programme.title: Bagets (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: In an age when life confuses more than it explains five teenaged boys come together and vow to uncover life’s mysteries and conquer the world. Witty, light-hearted coming-of-age movie about the joys and pains of growing up in these turbulent times.

programme.title: Kung Mahawi Man Ang Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The happy life of Hilda and her widowed mother, Gloria, changed for the worse when Eddie and his family moved in as their tenants. In no time at all, Gloria had gotten married to Eddie and was providing for his entire family. Still, she lived for the day when she would be able to reclaim what's rightfully hers.

programme.title: Anak Ni Baby Ama (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Baby Ama was a notorious hoodlum sent to the electric chair during the 60's. This movie is a fictionalized account of what life might have been for his son who came to this world already burdened with the memory of his father's life and death.

programme.title: Dalhin Mo Ako Sa Langit
programme.desc: Lani (Ynez Veneracion) is an ambitious village lass who wants to better her life. She uses her beauty towards this end and manages to worm her way into a rich family.

programme.title: Isa, Dalawa, Tatlo, Ang Tatay Kong Kalbo
programme.desc: Medel (Bembol Roco) is a pretty thief who gives his earnings to his neighbors who need it. But hid felonious activities stop when he marries Frieda (Beth Bautista) and adopts Bimbo (Niño Mulach).

programme.title: Maging Akin Ka Lamang (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The rich and beautiful Rosita would do anything to win the love of the man she had become obsessed with. Still, neither her beauty nor all the money in the world gave her what she wanted.

programme.title: Noel Juico, 16 Batang Kriminal
programme.desc: Noel (Raymart Santiago) tries to stay out of trouble. But trouble seems to follow him anyway. Can Noel disentangle himself from the dangerous web he himself created?

programme.title: Si Mokong, Si Astig At Si Gamol
programme.desc: Mokong and Astig were former street kids who now had wards of their own. They used their wits to support them with all types of scam.

programme.title: Ang Titser Kong Pogi
programme.desc: Joey Perez (Bong Revilla, Jr), a policeman goes to Subic as a Kindergarten teacher to secretly investigate the case where he was framed up. He becomes attached to Cynthia, a co-teacher and Jimbo.

programme.title: Tgis, The Movie
programme.desc: The top-rating TV show about teen-age life came to the screen in this adventure film where the TGIS kids learned the value of friendship.

programme.title: Campus Beat
programme.desc: The 15-year old Aga personifies the young man of the times. He is living a normal teen-age life, doing a balancing act between his separated parents, his family and his friends, his studies and his love for music and the beginnings of young love.

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Agaw-Armas
programme.desc: Benjie (Bong Revilla) is a hotel security officer who has just about everything going for him. His life seems almost perfect. Then, he is linked to a shooting incident tha may forever change his life.

programme.title: Dos Bravos
programme.desc: Pancho (Niño Muhlach) is travelling from one town to the next in the hope of finding his long lost father. His only clue is a handkerchief embroidered with an emblem of Hacienda BM. Later, Pancho ask the help of Valdes (Dante Varona).

programme.title: Kadenang Bulaklak
programme.desc: Three little girls were given up for adoption after their parents were killed in an accident. Vina, the oldest sister, was left behind with an aunt. She vowed that one day, she would find all her sisters and reunite her family.

programme.title: Lumaban Ka... Sagot Kita
programme.desc: Linette (Cherie Pie Picache) is an active student leader. She is frustrated that her boyfriend Dado (Julio Diaz) is apathetic towards the situation. But this will soon change.

programme.title: Onyok Velasco Story
programme.desc: Born to a family of boxers, Onyok Velasco ate and breathed boxing. The whole nation watched his fight, hoping and praying for Onyok to win the gold. Robbed of the gold or not, Onyok, without doubt, came home victorious.

programme.title: Epimaco Velasco Story, NBI
programme.desc: FPJ took on the role of the country's modern day hero, Epimaco Velasco. Presented here were some of the best known among the many celebrated cases he solved and his private life as a devoted family man.
